query:
-- Criar campanha
INSERT INTO campaigns (name, slug, subtitle, organizerName, organizerEmail, isActive, createdAt)
VALUES ('Teste Guilherme', 'teste-guilherme', '2026 - Teste de Autenticação', 'Guilherme Ramos', 'guilherme.ramos@constrixengenharia.com.br', 1, NOW());

-- Criar admin user (senha: senha123)
INSERT INTO admin_users (campaign_id, username, name, password_hash, is_owner, active, created_at)
VALUES (LAST_INSERT_ID(), 'guilherme.ramos@constrixengenharia.com.br', 'Guilherme Ramos', '$2a$10$N9qo8uLOickgx2ZMRZoMyeIjZAgcfl7p92ldGxad68LJZdL17lhWy', 1, 1, NOW());

-- Verificar criação
SELECT 
  c.id as campaign_id,
  c.slug,
  au.id as admin_id,
  au.username,
  au.name
FROM campaigns c
JOIN admin_users au ON au.campaign_id = c.id
WHERE c.slug = 'teste-guilherme';
